snippet.title: Sonic 2: Rescue Tails Demo - SAGE 2024 trailer
snippet.description:
As you can probably guess, Sonic 2: Rescue Tails is a fan remake of 8-bit Sonic 2 in the style of the 16-bit Sonic games. It will be part of SAGE 2024 and will be available to play on 06.09.2024.

https://sonicfangameshq.com/forums/showcase/sonic-2-rescue-tails.2323/

#sage2024 #sonicthehedgehog  #sonicfangames
